Use extremely easy to carry and be placed in your bag, outdoor camping, picnic, courtyard barbecue, that outdoor standing fan increases your comfort to create a cool environment. 7200mah rechargeable battery, ensure working 5~24 hours, no longer have to worry about power outages without electric fans on summer nights.

The removable fan grille makes it extremely easy to clean, you don't have to worry about getting dirty after a long time of use.

The stretch height can be fully adjusted from 5.8 "to 40.5", and the 270-degree adjustable tilt angle includes a tilt-back head, which provides you more choices in different height and angle, extremely convenient to adapt to different needs. Very suitable for storage or outdoor use.

【🎁 GREAT SERVICE FROM CUSTOMER SUPPORT】Magesh foldable pedestal fan each comes with a 12-month warranty and 90-day 100% money-back full refund guarantee. Folding pedestal fan design, the convenience of a USB desk fan, portability of outdoor standing fan, whether indoors or outdoors, the portable fan can easily handle all scenarios. On all accounts a fantastic fan. Support the power bank function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect with this. When I opened it and saw how small it was (See my old fan behind it for comparison) I thought it was going to be a joke.I was very wrong. It's powerful, the speed settings are great and you get great airflow no matter what speed you use, the little remote not only works for the fan but also mysteriously works for the space heater that I've had for years (as seen in the pic) as well, which is incredibly awesome. So now I have a remote controlled space heater somehow.It can also be converted to a table fan and, because of the compact size, can be taken with me easily if I ever wanted to take it anywhere, could easily fit in my luggage.It's very quiet too, which is actually a con for me because I enjoy the white noise of fans but could definitely be a plus for people that like a quiet fan or if you are staying with someone and want the airflow without the noise.Has multiple speeds, all with great air flow, the fan head is adjustable so you can angle it, and it's a USB cord charger (does not come with the plug in adapter part so you will need to have that to plug into the wall or surge protector, but if you don't have that just plug it into your comp or USB charge port and you're good to go). Also still runs while it's charging. I can't speak to how long it runs unplugged because I always have it plugged in.I would highly recommend for it's compactability, fan power, general cuteness, and magic remote that works on other devices somehow. Definitely more than worth it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My first purchase of the fan did not work. I tried everything: extra charging, trouble shooting, reading the manual. The reason I wanted this fan was because it is foldable, adjustable and easy to detach and clean. The remote is a plus. Fortunately, the company replaced my fan within 24hours. I plugged the new fan in and it worked perfectly. I'm in love with the soft pink color and the charging cord is not different from a plug-in fan. However, I am able to unplug a move about my space. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally versatile personal fan
reviews.reviewText: OMG this is the best personal fan I've ever seen! I do HIIT routines 3 times a day every day, so I always need to have a floor fan next to me. I gave my old one to a college kid so bought this one as replacement. This is such a wonderful fan!1) It's telescopic so it can be used as a desk fan as well as a floor one! 2) The build quality is pretty good, and the price is just great! 3) It's quite stylish. 4) It comes in a totally frustration-free box, very well packaged and easy to take out and super-easy to set up -- no tools needed at all! 5) Three fan speeds, and not noisy even at the highest speed. 6) One "natural wind" mode ("4th speed") that mimics natural on-and-off rhythm. 7) Cute remote for power, timer and speed/mode; remote can be put away in the base. 8) Can be folded away (the way it came out of the box). 9) Front grille can be easily removed to increase wind power further. 10) Built-in 7500 mAH LiIon battery, so it can be used without plugging in and can charge an iPhone!I'm going to buy two more for my study and bedroom. This is totally awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Overall, it’s a good fan. Very portable and durable. It can go from being a small desk to a stand up fan in no time. It’s quiet in my opinion.Cons: I wish it had some more ‘power’. You need it on the highest setting which kills the battery a lot sooner, (expect 2 hrs tops) and even then the highest setting still feels a bit weak. That’s really the only negative, otherwise it fits my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink fan down lol
reviews.reviewText: This can be a nice fan I love this fan I 1st got this fan last year August 23 when I receive this fan oh my god the wind it does not disappoint but they need to do better with is stability it's not able to hold the charge. Wont stay charged long enough like a regular fan and then when I charge it up the whole entire day I'll come home use it for a like 2 hours its done for They need better quality working fans it lasted me a year I'm thankful for that but I can easily buy $20 fan old school box fan and that would lastme for years years not just 1 year this fan doesn't hold charge long enough its very beautiful to look at it has a remote capabilities so you don't have to get up out of your bed to cut it on and it blows amazing but it doesn't last you all need to do better if you want people to continue by your product upgrade the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value and durability is good
reviews.reviewText: Rechargeable Extendable Portable Fan. I like the fact it extends up and down to reach different heights. It locks when in up position. I did not get the oscillation type. The base is not heavy, but it holds the fan and gives plenty of air. Not noisy at all. Ohhhh it comes with the remote (use battery). It controls timer and speed - as does the base. It fit perfectly into small spaces, USB charging. It’s sturdy I must admit. I keep in box when not using. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fan is so cute & works great! Easy to put away & move around. Well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing compact fan
reviews.reviewText: This fan is absolutely amazing. It’s very light weight and compact. I packed it in my suitcase for my travels and camping. It can change height from a table top height to a standing fan height. It has 4 settings: low, medium, high, and pulsing. I love the light rose color. The charge lasts a long time: many, many hours. I can charge it with my USB cable. Very convenient. It cools me down quickly too. Perfect for hot days.
Buen producto, portabilidad y eficiencia, el control remoto incluye batería. En estos tiempos de apagones es recomendable tener uno.
